jsint
Class Reflector

java.lang.Object
  jsint.Procedure
      jsint.Reflector
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, SchemeProcedure
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaField, JavaMethod, StaticReflector
public abstract class Reflector
extends Procedure

A Reflector contains one or more Java metaobjects that are cached. They need to be reset() when the classpath is reset.

See Also:
Serialized Form
